data.title: Obituary for Ruth Martin Roberts
data.meta_description: Ruth Martin Roberts, age 73, of Drift, KY wife of Joe Ermel Roberts, passed away Saturday February 6, 2010 at her residence. She was born May 23, 1936 in Drift, KY the daughter of the late Paris Martin and Nancy Stumbo Martin. Mrs. Roberts was a homemaker.   Survivors include...
data.text:
Ruth Martin Roberts, age 73, of Drift, KY wife of Joe Ermel Roberts, passed away Saturday February 6, 2010 at her residence. She was born May 23, 1936 in Drift, KY the daughter of the late Paris Martin and Nancy Stumbo Martin. Mrs. Roberts was a homemaker.

Survivors include her husband Joe, one daughter, Rita Jo (Silas) Slone of Drift, KY one son Ricky Darrell (Nancy) Roberts of Drift, KY one brother Clinnon Martin of Drift, KY three grandchildren, Amanda Jo Vance,

Angela Shea Lykins and Amber Nicole Roberts. two great grandchildren, Ethan Darrell Vance and Kaylee Brooke Vance.

Mrs. Roberts was preceded in death by her parents one brother Clarence Martin.

Funeral service for Ruth Martin Roberts will be conducted Tuesday, February 9, 2010 at 1 p.m. in the Hall Funeral Home Chapel, Martin, KY with Ted Shannon officiating. Burial will follow in the Roberts Family Cemetery, Drift, KY with the Hall Funeral Home caring for those arrangements. Visitation is after 5:00 p.m. Sunday at Hall Funeral Home

Visitation

After 5:00 p.m. Sunday here at Hall Funeral Home

Funeral

1:00 p.m. Tuesday, Hall Funeral Home with Ted Shannon officiating.

Interment

Roberts Family Cemetery, Drift, KY
